attributes.action: Build Wellingborough a full time boxing gym.
attributes.additional_details: Boxing has changed so many peoples lives. It teaches you respect. It keeps youngsters  out of trouble. It makes a difference. You learn to be confident. You learn to look after yourself. You create friendships. You can turn a dream into reality. You gain respect from so many people and it is so rewarding.
attributes.background: Build Wellingborough a full time boxing gym that’s open everyday for all of those that love the sport or even go there to stay off the streets. Instead of renting sports rooms. Boxing can help people a lot and keep youngsters off the streets and using energy in a different way.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local leisure facilities are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
